short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid spoilers and stay ignorant with this Reddit blocker. Filter out posts from subreddits before or after a given time and date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Planning to watch the movie/game/show later? Is work or school preventing you from staying up? Want to browse Reddit in the meantime? Spoilers in titles are a pain, but with potentially dozens of posts on the same topic, having to guess the keywords they might use with a conventional feed blocker can be a pain in itself.

This Reddit feed blocker blocks content from subreddits before or after a given time and date, enabling you to browse your favorite subreddits without fear of spoilers.

Features include:
- Compatibility with Old and New Reddit
- Support for many types of feeds—home, popular, all, search, individual subreddits
- Support for multiple filters at the same time
- Ability to toggle filters on and off at will
- Ability to choose precise times and dates, down to the exact minute

NOTE:
Reddit Spoiler Avoider may ask for permission to read and change your data on Reddit websites. The sole purpose of this is to block posts on the pages — we do not collect personal information, browsing history, or any other type of sensitive data.

Version 0.0.3
- Added support for search and comment feeds for New Reddit
- Fixed bug where later posts would not be filtered out
- Fixed bug where filters would not be applied when navigating to a subreddit using the sidebar
